action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hello Heath

Regarding the Colour Chart, the image is grainy as it was taken in low light. There's not much we can do about that I'm afraid. We have removed the blue colour from the ceiling though. TVM, might have to see if we can find a new image - is great what you have done with it, but we have supplied you with a bad image, sorry. We will use your chart version it in the meantime but don't upload it to website yet, please.
Regarding removing or disabling the whole non-stock page... If we do this, these colours won't be visible anywhere, besides the download. Is that ok? That's fine.

The tick boxes have been ordered. Thanks 😊

Regards

Juli JeffreyOffice Manager

Tel: 1300 387 228



Did you know, our Durasafe 13mm Compact Laminate is not only antibacterial and antifungal, it's also now antiviral? Find out exactly how.

Hi Juli,

Regarding the Colour Chart, the image is grainy as it was taken in low light. There's not much we can do about that I'm afraid. We have removed the blue colour from the ceiling though. 

Regarding removing or disabling the whole non-stock page... If we do this, these colours won't be visible anywhere, besides the download. Is that ok? 

The tick boxes have been ordered.

Good morning Heath

Its looking good, and I like the way the front cover image matches the branding better now. A few questions/requests, as usual.

Colour chart

Front page image - checking if it is full res? Is there any way to sharpen it and make the doors less pixelated, please? And remove some of the blue from the ceiling?

Website https://duracube.com.au/colours/

Remove (or disable?) the whole non-stock page. Maybe then we don't need the "reset filter" button.

Stock page sample requests - put the tick boxes into numerical order (down, then across?)



Thanks heaps

Regards

Juli JeffreyOffice Manager

Tel: 1300 387 228

Confirming we have updated the website and the updated pdf is attached. Let me know if we are ok to load this up to the site?

Thanks Heath, and apologies for the omission

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hello Heath

Can I ask you to do some edits to the Duracube Colour Chart, please?

Colour Chart PDF

Update Edition number to V5.0 2022

Change front cover (same branding). I've added a cropped version to give you an idea of the image we want to use this time, but included the larger file here https://drive.google.com/file/d/1shz4hN0h-hX1P4UyfKAwKL5bLg4JiQoz/view?usp=sharing Is it possible to tweak the colour a little so it coordinates better with our branding colours?

Add new colours to stock range

  • 5388 Alpine Ash
  • 138 Red Ochre
  • 5333 Southern Pine
  • 5389 Deep Woods

Add the NEW labels to above colours

Remove the NEW labels from 290 Marine/289 Dusk/297 Deep Water

Put Red Ochre between Royal Blue and Sunset. All other woodgrains to go light to dark

Page 5 update numbers

Matt finish

Gloss finish

Raw oak finish

Stocked

29

-

-

Non-stock

29

58

58

Standard core

Coloured core

Multi core

Stocked

29

-

-

Non-stock

29

58

58

Supply us with an email-size PDF of chart

Corresponding Website edits

Put 111 Artic White on sample request form

Remove 204 Red Apple and 5853 Lunar Rock from sample request form (it's now non-stock)

Add new colours to https://duracube.com.au/colours/# and sample request form

  • 5388 Alpine Ash
  • 138 Red Ochre
  • 5333 Southern Pine
  • 5389 Deep Woods

When colour chart is okayed, add to website downloads

Please and thankyou

Regards


Juli Jeffrey
Office Manager
Tel: 1300 387 228
